text:
Marketing Manager | Honey.is | NYC, New York | ONSITE | Full Time

Honey is an early-stage startup building the most intuitive and beautiful tools for internal company communication and collaboration.

We are looking for an amazing, data-driven marketer to own the marketing funnel for our company. You will be in charge of attracting site traffic, converting that traffic into new leads for the business, and, alongside the sales team, nurturing those leads to close into customers.

https://honey.is/jobs/new-york/marketing-manager/9c6a1f0d-5d...
